thread.title: Mint Blockchain Launches $MINT Token to Power the Future of NFTs and AI
thread.title_full: Mint Blockchain Launches $MINT Token to Power the Future of NFTs and AI

author: Shahzaib Ahmed
title: Mint Blockchain Launches $MINT Token to Power the Future of NFTs and AI
text:
Mint blockchain unleashes its native token, $MINT to reshape the landscape of non-fungible tokens (NFTs) and artificial intelligence (AI). $MINT is the first utility token powered by Superchain, adopting the token standard of SuperchainERC20. This native token enables effortless interoperability with the network of Optimism.
Introducing $MINT , the native token of the Mint Blockchain Ecosystem ðŸ€ $MINT is the first utility token of a Superchain to use SuperchainERC20 token standard with @Optimism interoperability.
82% of $MINT will be devoted to Mint Blockchain Ecosystem & Community, MintDAO, andâ€¦ pic.twitter.com/bCmeCjNZZc
â€” MintðŸ€ (@Mint_Blockchain) February 27, 2025 This cutting-edge advancement enhances the decentralized infrastructure. It further enables the owning and exchanging of NFT assets to empower humans and AI agents. Mint, a Layer 2 blockchain linking global consumers with NFTs, witnesses the advancement via its official X account.
Mint to Empower its Community through its Token Launch Mint, by unveiling its token $MINT, aims to enable community participation and decentralized governance. A significant token supply of 82% will be provided to the Mint Blockchain ecosystem, MintDAO, including incentive programs. This distribution aims to provide various rewards to community builders, ecosystem developers, and early supporters.
The token, $MINT, is the backbone of the Mint ecosystem which offers staking assets, transactions, pricing NFTs, Artificial Intelligence, Digital Assets, and RWAs. the governance model provides $MINT token holders an opportunity to participate in the process of decision-making. It further boosts the commitment of the project in introducing decentralization.
Mint Blockchainâ€™s Process of Staking and Incentive The staking and restaking mechanism of Mint aims to provide a unique curve model of bonding. His process offers rewards to users in the form of $MINT and $ETH. This advancement provides an annual percentage rate (APR) of 15%, giving users sharing rights in the revenue of the network. Over 35 months, the token unleash schedule will be introduced, providing rewards to community members.
Loyal users will be able to extend the incentives such as MintID NFT stakers, winners of various Mint community events, and Mint Forest users. Mint already possesses 100 ecosystem applications which support it since the release of Dev Mainnet in May 2024. The platform strives to enhance large-scale evolution, offering programmable NFT assets.
In 2025, the next app layer development will also boost the dynamic growth of the network. This advanced step welcomes a new era of innovative and inclusive NFT. Mint blockchain, via its $MINT token launch, is set to expand its vision by offering a pivotal role in inventing the future of decentralized digital assets.
